assessmentInformation: This unit is assessed, please see the Guidance Notes for details
overviewInformation:
## The UK's leading legal training and information company specifically for non-lawyers.

> "Bond Solon in just one session transformed an over confident and impatient CEO into a calm and thoughtful witness who impressed the tribunal."  
  
Audley Sheppard, QC, Clifford Chance

<iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/fp-52d4HxtY" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

testimonials.citationAdditional: Paediatric Neurology - UH Bristol NHS Trust
testimonials.text: This was the perfect course to help me build on what I’d gained from 2 years’ experience of writing reports.

title: Excellence in Report Writing - Written Evidence
